content.rendered: Full of nourishing, anti-aging antioxidants and rich, super-hydrating oils, this luxurious miracle cream smooths and tones skin as it seriously moisturises. Macadamia and avocado oils protect against free radical damage; rosewood extracts support cell renewal; hazelnut, almond, grapefruit seed, geranium, sandalwood, and rose extracts combine to minimise lines and even the complexion. This luxurious pure botanical formula absorbs quickly to leave skin radiant and plumped.

excerpt.rendered: Full of nourishing, anti-aging antioxidants and rich, super-hydrating oils, this luxurious miracle cream smooths and tones skin as it seriously moisturises.
